alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 3:47AM MST until December 29 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Teller County, the Rampart Range and Pikes Peak,and Southern El Paso County including Colorado Springs. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick and snow covered roads, especially over bridges, overpasses and untreated road surfaces. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
